methods.name: getUnsignedValue
methods.comment: Get the unsigned value of a number.

params.name: value
params.comment: the value stored in a signed number

return.comment: the unsigned value of the number

methods.name: equalsMaxUnsignedValue
methods.comment: Compare to the maximum unsigned value that the current number is holding.

params.name: value
params.comment: the value stored in a signed number

return.comment: true if equal to the maximum and false otherwise
